channel.title: Hard drive
channel.description:
I went to my uncles the other day he had an old piece of shit computer. I took it just to have a little fun. Its got a -----1992----- hard drive in it. i put the RAM in a different computer to see whats an it. Its pretty epic.
Any ideas of what i could do with this high tech piece of equipment?

item.title: Hard drive
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You could install linux on it.

Read full topic
